<h3 id="X38221">X(38221) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(15), X(16)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(3*a^4+2*(b+c)*a^3-2*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a+b^4-b^2*c^2+c^4)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38221) = X(1)+2*X(187) = 2*X(1)+X(5184) = X(15)+2*X(11708) = X(16)+2*X(11707) = 4*X(187)-X(5184) = 4*X(230)-X(13178) = X(316)-4*X(1125) = X(355)-4*X(14693) = X(385)+2*X(11711) = 4*X(625)-7*X(3624) = 2*X(1385)+X(2080) = 2*X(1386)+X(5104) = 4*X(2021)-X(12782) = 4*X(2030)-X(3751) = 5*X(3616)+X(14712) = X(6781)+2*X(11725) = 5*X(7987)-2*X(18860) = 5*X(8227)-2*X(13449) = X(9855)+2*X(12258) = X(9864)-4*X(37459)</b>
<p>X(38221) lies on these lines: {1,187}, {15,11708}, {16,11707}, {30,38220}, {214,238}, {230,13178}, {316,1125}, {355,14693}, {385,11711}, {511,3576}, {512,25569}, {515,38227}, {517,38225}, {518,1691}, {519,26613}, {625,3624}, {952,38230}, {985,37525}, {1326,4653}, {1385,2080}, {1386,5104}, {1420,5194}, {1570,9592}, {2021,12782}, {2030,3751}, {2031,9575}, {2076,11368}, {2459,35774}, {2460,35775}, {3601,5148}, {3616,14712}, {3849,25055}, {5006,5692}, {5215,19875}, {5426,30571}, {6781,11725}, {7987,18860}, {8227,13449}, {9855,12258}, {9864,37459}, {9881,27088}, {10631,10789}, {11676,11710}, {13174,32456}, {13624,35002}, {15177,32762}, {31275,34595}</p>
<p>
X(38221) = reflection of X(19875) in X(5215)<br>
X(38221) = {X(1), X(187)}-harmonic conjugate of X(5184)<br>
</p>
